Source.Name: pluma
Source.Summary: Text Editor for the MATE Desktop
Source.Description: pluma is a small and lightweight UTF-8 text editor for the MATE environment. Based on gedit, the text editor for the GNOME2 environment.

Package.Summary: Text Editor for the MATE Desktop
